turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order four large pizzas from Bella Luna, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a chicken alfredo for one, the works for the second one.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Just add pepperoni for the third and for the fourth one I would like mushroom, pepperoni, olives, and sausages.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sorry, the works is not available. would you like to order something else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What do you have with everything on it?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: there is the house special that includes meat and veggies.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, let's do that.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can you please confirm the other two?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: chicken Alfredo

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: pepperoni.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And mushroom, pepperoni, olives, and sausage.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so i have 4 large pizzas, a chicken alfredo, a house special, a pepperoni and mushrooms, pepperoni, olives and sausage. is this correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what type of crust would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you make that with thick crust, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: thick crust on all 4 pizzas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you got it. any special instructions?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No special instructions, just the crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. your total will be $55.78.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sounds good. When can I pick it up?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your pizzas will be ready for pickup in 45 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Alright, I'll be there then. Thank you very much. Goodbye.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're welcome! bye!
